title.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR
title.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR
title.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR

tagline.title: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BALI ELEPHANT PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING VIEW OF VOLCANO AT KINTAMANI VILLAGE
tagline.text: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BALI ELEPHANT PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING VIEW OF VOLCANO AT KINTAMANI VILLAGE
tagline.html: BALI ELEPHANT RIDE AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS BALI COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY RIDE AN ELEPHANT AT BALI ELEPHANT PARKS AND CONTINUE VISITING VIEW OF VOLCANO AT KINTAMANI VILLAGE

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages by offer Double exciting experience of Riding an Elephant and see the view of Mount Batur Volcano at Kintamani Village. Is amazing experience you will have during Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour which is get chance to get closed with biggest animals (elephants) and riding on the top and the tour will continue to Kintamani Village, exacly at Penelokan village to see the beautiful scenery of activie mount Batur volcano and also you will see the amazing beautiful Lake Batur from penelokan village. Places of interest or tour itinerary will be visit during the trip is Visiting Bali Elephant Parks for enjoy ride the Elephant for 30 minutes through the jungle, rice paddy and passed the Balinese local village, then you will enjoy having lunch at restaurant, after lunch we will continue the tour to visiting Kintamani Village, exactly visiting Penelokan Village at Kintamani District, from penelokan we will see the beautiful and amazing view of active volcano Mount Batur and Lake Batur, is great view, you can take picture of Kintamani volcano as much as you like and is free, Then tour will continue to visit Coffee Plantation where we can see variety of coffee, including coffee luwak process making, Then tour continue to visit Tegallalang rice terrace, located around 45 minutes from Kintamani village, in here you will rice paddy scenery with small valey, the rice terrace here is famous for tourist destination, mostly guest visit after do some trip to Kintamani Volcano. Then we directly back to your hotel by bring an amazing experience and great memory during Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Volcano Tour. Below is description of tourist destination you will visit during the tour.

Then we directly back to your hotel by bring an amazing experience and great memory during Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Volcano Tour. Below is description of tourist destination you will visit during the tour.

title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour | Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour offer you opportunity to ride an Elephant for 30 minutes ride at Bakas Elephant Parks, is rare experience to sits on the top of the biggest animal and passed through the jungle, rice paddy and Balinese local village with great view of panorama scenery you will have. Bakas Elephant Parks is one of the popular elephant park to enjoy see the elephant and ride the elephant, in here you also can see Elephant do show for tourist, enjoy take picture as much as you like with the biggest animal (elephant) in the parks. Never missed this opportunity and make your holiday in Bali islands more impressive.
description.html: Bali Elephant Ride Tour offer you opportunity to ride an Elephant for 30 minutes ride at Bakas Elephant Parks, is rare experience to sits on the top of the biggest animal and passed through the jungle, rice paddy and Balinese local village with great view of panorama scenery you will have. Bakas Elephant Parks is one of the popular elephant park to enjoy see the elephant and ride the elephant, in here you also can see Elephant do show for tourist, enjoy take picture as much as you like with the biggest animal (elephant) in the parks. Never missed this opportunity and make your holiday in Bali islands more impressive.

title.title: Kintamani Volcano View | Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour | Kintamani Volcano View | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani is village in country side located in highland and popular tourist destination for amazing mountain tourism object site most visited. In kintamani village the best place to see the volcano with good angle view and good place for foto is at Penelokan village, in here provide a place you can see the active volcano of mount Batur and also you will see the beautiful lake Batur located side by side with the mountain. Is great scenery and if first time you visit the Kintamani village and see the volcano, i am sure you will impressed so much with the view.

title.title: Bali Coffee Plantations | Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Coffee Plantations | Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Coffee Plantation is espresso ranch or most known as a Bali Agro tourism which celebrated with the numerous sorts of espresso creation. Experience to see how to make Balinese coffee in very traditional ways, and taste the fresh of Balinese coffee or ginger tea with green view river valley. You can sit neglecting the ranch and appreciate a crisply prepared mug of espresso produced using beans discharged from an Asian Palm Civet. To be guaranteed the espresso is sheltered to devour, observe around the ranch to perceive how they cook the beans and even view an espresso consuming civets close up

title.title: Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour | Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegallalang is a balinese local village located in the north of Ubud village, this village have amazing view of Rice Terrace and small valley, this village most visited by guest after do some Kintamani Tour to Mount Batur Volcano View and stop here to take picture and enjoy the fresh air from the scenery. Is great place to stop, i here also have small cafe, you can have some drink while enjoy the view of rice terrace. We will visit this village after see the view of Kintamani volcano, our driver will be asist you to take picture with background of Rice Terrace.

price.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,350,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,075,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 950,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 850,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour Price Include :

  • Private Car with Good A/C
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • 30 minutes Elephant Ride
  • Entrance Ticket
  • Indonesian Lunch
  • Mineral Water

itinerary.title: Bali Elephant Ride and Kintamani Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Bali Elephant Ride at Bakas Elephant Parks
Visit Kintamani Village for Volcano View
Visit Tegallalang Rice Terrace

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
